contentrichtext.text: [[Image:volvo vesc.jpg|thumb|right|250px|right|Volvo VESC]] '''Volvo VESC''', the ''Volvo Experimental Safety Car'', was an [[Experimental Safety Vehicle|ESV]] [[concept car]]<ref>[http://www.dn.se/motor/ett-sakert-kort-fran-hisingen DN: Ett s채kert kort fr책n Hisingen]</ref> built by [[Volvo Cars|Volvo]] in 1972.<ref>[http://www.klassiker.nu/video/mannen-bakom-vesc-berattar-2935 Klassiker: Mannen bakom VESC ber채ttar!]</ref><ref>[http://www.klassiker.nu/reportage/volvos-sakerhetsbil-fyller-40-2848 Klassiker: Volvos s채kerhetsbil fyller 40!]</ref> Its design emphasized [[car safety]] and many of the ideas (especially the front) would later appear on the [[Volvo 240]]. With safety features such as [[crumple zone]]s, rollover protection, a 'disappearing' steering wheel, [[anti-lock braking system]], automatic [[seat belts]], [[airbag]]s, pop-up [[headrest|head restraints]], interior trim and reversing, or [[backup camera]], the VESC attracted enormous attention.{{cn|date=June 2012}} ==See also== *[[Experimental Safety Vehicle]] == References == {{reflist}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Volvo Vesc}} [[Category:Volvo concept vehicles|VESC]] [[Category:Car safety]] {{Classicpow-auto-stub}}
